name: Han With Heavy Blaster Pistol
Lore: 'Scoundrel, smuggler, gambler and risk taker. ''Everything''s going to be fine. Trust me.''',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with Luke or Chewie. Permanent weapon is •Han''s Heavy Blaster Pistol (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).',
